amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service by $2.5 million for use against specialty crop pests and reduces funding for the Office of the Secretary by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service by $2.5 million for use against specialty crop pests and to reduce funding for the Office of the Secretary by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hinojosa amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
